stories.content: Overheard at a café in Stockholm: Someone claimed they'd seen a moose casually strolling in Gamla Stan!
A local in Gothenburg swore they spotted a submarine surfacing near the archipelago. Could it be true?
Rumor has it that a famous Hollywood star was seen buying kanelbullar at a bakery in Malmö!
Did you hear about the Uppsala student who allegedly invented a new language just for their thesis?
A group in Umeå claimed they found a hidden treasure map in an old book at the city library.
Locals in Lund were baffled by a mysterious cat that only appears during full moons to play the piano in a window.
A fisherman in Helsingborg insists he caught a fish that could speak three languages!
A mysterious figure in a cloak was seen performing magic tricks on the streets of Västerås.
Residents of Örebro talk about a secret underground city only accessible through hidden passages in the castle.
In Linköping, there's a tale of a ghostly cyclist who rides through the main square at midnight.
